blocks.title: Powerful New Integrations
blocks.content: Power up WPForms with brand new integrations for Google Drive, Mailpoet, Pipedrive, Zoho CRM & Make.

blocks.title: The Future of Forms Is Here: AI-Powered Form Creation
blocks.content: Use WPForms AI to create perfect forms in seconds by simply describing what you need.

main.url: https://wpforms.com/docs/generating-forms-with-wpforms-ai/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=AI Forms Get Started Lite

blocks.title: Take Control with File Upload Restrictions
blocks.content: Ever consider collecting uploaded files with form submissions? Now you can choose who has access.

main.url: https://wpforms.com/wpforms-lite-upgrade/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=File Upload Restrictions Upgrade Now Lite

blocks.title: Connect with Customers with Twilio
blocks.content: Send instant personalized text messages to help boost engagement and receive form submissions right to your phone.

main.url: https://wpforms.com/wpforms-lite-upgrade/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=Twilio Upgrade to Get Started Lite

blocks.title: Effortlessly Manage File Uploads
blocks.content: Automate file uploads directly to your Dropbox folders with conditional sorting with the new WPForms Dropbox addon.

main.url: https://wpforms.com/wpforms-lite-upgrade/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=Dropbox Upgrade to Get Started Lite

blocks.title: Streamline Your Workflow With Slack
blocks.content: Boost efficiency with the WPForms Slack addon by instantly receiving form notifications in your Slack channel or DM of choice.
